meanings.definition: Not able to be seen or perceived.
meanings.sent1: The ghostly figure was viewless, disappearing into the mist.
meanings.sent2: The viewless spirit haunted the old mansion, unseen but felt by all.
meanings.sent3: The viewless cat kept knocking things off the shelf, playing an invisible game.
meanings.sent4: His viewless presence in the room gave me chills, as if a ghost was watching.
meanings.sent5: The viewless wind whispered secrets through the trees, its presence only felt in the rustling leaves.

meanings.definition: Lacking a visible or tangible presence.
meanings.sent1: The viewless shadow seemed to follow her wherever she went.
meanings.sent2: The viewless threat of danger hung in the air, making everyone uneasy.
meanings.sent3: The viewless aroma of freshly baked cookies filled the room, though no cookies were in sight.
meanings.sent4: His viewless touch on her shoulder sent shivers down her spine, though no one was there.
meanings.sent5: The viewless barrier between them seemed insurmountable, like an invisible wall dividing their worlds.
